intro: This directory mirrors curated corpora published to the shared OneDrive `knowledge_base/` folder. Each subdirectory corresponds to a dated drop and contains the artifacts required for retrieval-augmented training.

drops.title: Knowledge Base Expansion
drops.description: Added playbook documentation, prompt templates, and evaluation snapshots for the October knowledge base refresh.

maintenance: Update `index.json` whenever new OneDrive manifests or mirrored corpora are added, then re-run the sync script to regenerate this overview.
Commit the refreshed "README.md" alongside any new manifests, metadata snapshots, or dataset files to keep the knowledge base discoverable.
